additionalRemarks._instruction: Enter any additional remarks concerning this MR image.

dataLocation._instruction: Add the location of the file or file bundle in which the image is stored.

device._instruction: Add the MRI machine setting used for this image acquisition.

fieldOfView._instruction: Enter the field of view of this image.

flipAngle._instruction: Enter the flip angele of this MR image in degrees.

input._instruction: Add the state of the subject or tissue sample before this session.

internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier (or label) of this image that is used within the corresponding data files to identify this recording.

interSliceGap._instruction: Enter the inter slice disctance between slices of this MR image.

name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this image.

negativeContrast._instruction: Boolean specifying whether increasing voxel intensity (within sample voxels) denotes a decreased value with respect to the contrast suffix.

numberOfSlices._instruction: Enter number of slices in this MR image.

recordedWith._instruction: Add the device used to generate this recording.

sliceEncodingDirection._instruction: Add axis of the NIfTI data along which slices were acquired, and the direction in which 'SliceTiming' is defined with respect to.

sliceThickness._instruction: Enter the slice thickness of this MR image.

sliceTiming._instruction: Enter the time in which each slice have been aquired within each vloume.
